snippet: Two Mexican nationals were charged in the death of Chief Petty Officer Terrell Horne, who was killed on Sunday in an encounter with smuggling suspects off the California coast.
abstract: Mexican nationals Jose Meija-Leyva and Manuel Beltran-Higuera are charged in death of Chief Petty Officer Terrell Horne, who was killed in encounter with the smuggling suspects off coast of Santa Barbara, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Two Mexican nationals were charged in the death of Chief Petty Officer Terrell Horne, who was killed on Sunday in an encounter with smuggling suspects off the California coast.

headline.seo: 2 Mexican Men Charged in Coast Guard Death
headline.main: 2 Charged in Death of Coast Guard Member
headline.print_headline: 2 Charged in Death of Coast Guard Member
